name: Fractured Voyage
description:
Survive and fight off the darkness on an alien planet, after your spaceship was brutally destroyed. At day mine for resources and build your house, but when night falls this alien planet has many surprises in store for you.

Are the local species friendly, or not?

And will you survive or perish?

.: Destroy those aliens with four different swords
.: Build the greatest houses with twenty different blocks
.: Craft many items and survive the night
.: Rebuild your spaceship and return to Earth
.: Explore a randomly generated planet



NOTE: It may take a while to load when you press play, load and save. This is normal.
